bilingual.target: 科学？我们总是去科学博物馆。

bilingual.source: If you like science, you can be a scientist.
bilingual.target: 如果你喜欢科学，你可以成为科学家。

list.abstract: 科学（Science）是一个建立在可检验的解释和对客观事物的形式、组织等进行预测的有序知识系统，是已系统化和公式化了的知识。 根据科学反映对象的领域，主要分为自然科学、社会科学、思维科学、形式科学和交叉学科，其对象是客观现象，内容是形式化的科学理论，形式是语言。

哲学家和科学家经常试图给何为科学和科学方法提供一个充分的本质主义定义但并不很成功，笼统地说，科学即反映自然、社会、思维等的客观规律的分科知识体系。“科学”一词由近代日本学界初用于对译英文中的“science”及其它欧洲语言中的相应词汇，欧洲语言中该词来源于拉丁文“scientia”，意为“知识”、“学问”，在近代侧重关于自然的学问。科学一词在中国古汉语中意为“科举之学”。明治时代日本启蒙思想家西周使用“科学”作为“science”的译词。到了1893年，康有为引进并使用“科学”二字。此后，“科学”二字便在中国广泛运用。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you dare use science against me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你休想用科学对付我。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure. I'm pretty passionate about science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以啊，我对科学就很热爱。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the science. Those are the facts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是科学的结论，这些都是事实。

yingyinNormal.en: You put moths in my food?! For science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在我食物里放虫子？！为了科学而献身。

yingyinNormal.en: Why not actually look at, the real science there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么不看看存在的真正的科学?

yingyinNormal.en: This is Science Friday. I'm Ira Flatow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里是"科学星期五"，我是Ira Flatow。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, luckily, science has provided its own video camera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 幸运的是，科学自能说明真相。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, I'm Ira Flatow, and this is Science Friday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎收听《科学星期五》，我是艾拉·菲莱。

yingyinNormal.en: It's time for Professor Proton's science joke of the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在到了质子教授的每日科学笑话栏目。

yingyinNormal.en: Science? Shocking! You don't understand. This could be really big.
yingyinNormal.zh: 科学吗？真"没想到"啊！你可能不理解。这可能十分重大呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, and the science dudes want to talk science with you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好棒哦，科学小子们要和你聊科学了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ah, not yet. I want to talk science with the science dudes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等下，我还想和这帮捣腾科学的小子聊聊科学呢。

yingyinNormal.en: No, this is for science. I can be brave for science. Thank you. Oh, jiminy, that's cold!
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，这是为了科学，我可以为科学而勇敢。谢谢啊。我擦，好冰啊！

yingyinNormal.en: The element never existed. I didn't take it away, science took it away. Be mad at science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个元素从来都不存在，我没有抢走它，是科学抢走了它，跟科学发火吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, for science, maybe I will! For science, maybe you should! Fine! Fine! Good. Great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了科学，也许我愿意。为了科学，也许你应该这样做。行。行。很好。好极了。

yingyinNormal.en: Wormholes. They're a staple of science fiction, but they're based on real science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虫洞。它们是科幻片的基本特征，但它们都基于真正的科学。

yingyinNormal.en: Was that a science diss? Yeah. Was it a good one?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这算是科学版撕逼吗？对。这句撕得狠吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But the foundations of this film are rooted in real science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这部影片的基础植根于真正的科学。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, did he ever make you, I don't know, hate science and the people who do it? What are you saying?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那他有过让你觉得，比方说，痛恨科学与搞科学的人吗？你什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, well, Leonard's here now. You can talk science with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反正莱纳德来了。你可以跟他聊科学了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 神经科学；神经系统科学
adj. 科学的；有关科学的；用于科学的；系统的；有条理的
n. 原型科学；原始科学

word_family.mean: n. 科学；学科；专门科学；知识

科学和技术；科学技术；科学与技术

sense_info_list.en: knowledge about the natural world that is based on facts learned through experiments and observation

examination_example.sentence: But the intention is not to neglect social <highlight>science</highlight>; rather, the complete opposite.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但目的不是忽视社会科学，而是恰恰相反。

examination_example.sentence: In some ways, this quest for commonalities defines <highlight>science</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，对共性的追求定义了科学。

examination_example.sentence: But in the everyday practice of <highlight>science</highlight>, discovery frequently follows an ambiguous and complicated route.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是在科学的日常实践中，发现经常遵循一条模糊而复杂的路线。

sense_info_list.en: a subject that is formally studied

examination_example.sentence: The zoology program attracts students for whom zoo visits were the crucial formative experience that led them to major in biological <highlight>sciences</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个动物学课程吸引了许多学生，对他们来说，参观动物园是一段至关重要的成长经历，促使他们主修生物科学。

examination_example.sentence: The Breakthrough Prize in Life <highlight>Sciences</highlight>, launched this year, takes an unrepresentative view of what the life <highlight>sciences</highlight> include.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年推出的生命科学突破奖对生命科学包括的内容采取了不具代表性的观点。

examination_example.sentence: In response, the American Academy formed the Commission on the Humanities and Social <highlight>Sciences</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为回应，美国科学院成立了人文社会科学委员会。

examination_example.sentence: It was of great significance to rocket <highlight>science</highlight>.

examination_example.sentence: They will see the complexity of <highlight>science</highlight>.

examination_example.sentence: Natural <highlight>sciences</highlight> should be learned the way humanities courses are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自然科学应该像人文课程一样学习。

examination_example.sentence: They prioritize arts subjects over maths and <highlight>sciences</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把文科优先于数学和科学。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

sense_info_list.en: knowledge about the natural world that is based on facts learned through experiments and observation

examination_example.sentence: Those words uttered by pioneering British scientist Rosalind Franklin, who firmly believed that the pursuit of <highlight>science</highlight> should be accessible to all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这句话是英国科学家先驱罗莎琳德·富兰克林说的，她坚信，对科学的追求应该是人人都能达到的。

examination_example.sentence: When I talk about cooking, I'm not talking about creating elaborate dinner parties or three-day <highlight>science</highlight> projects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我说到烹饪时，我指的不是精心制作的晚宴或为期三天的科学项目。

examination_example.sentence: But many tech home remedies can be explained by a little <highlight>science</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但许多技术家庭疗法可以用一点科学来解释。

sense_info_list.en: a subject that is formally studied

examination_example.sentence: In social <highlight>sciences</highlight>, this is known as examining "near misses" and "narrow wins" in areas where merit is subjective.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社会学中，这被称为在主观价值的领域考察“侥幸”和“侥幸”。

examination_example.sentence: In the competitive game of biomedical <highlight>science</highlight>, research has been done on scientists who narrowly lost or won grant money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在生物医学的竞争游戏中，研究的对象都是那些以微弱劣势输掉或赢得资助的科学家。

examination_example.sentence: Others may experience a hopelessness that results in failing their core classes, such as English, <highlight>science</highlight> and math.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一些人可能会感到绝望，从而导致核心课程不及格，比如英语、科学和数学。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: What can we infer about girls from the study in <highlight>Science</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从《科学》杂志的研究中，我们可以推断出关于女孩的什么信息？

examination_example.sentence: It is our hope that advances in <highlight>science</highlight> will offer new perspectives (视角) from which to study how people manage their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望，科学的进步将为研究人们如何管理自己的生活提供新的视角。

examination_example.sentence: Great improvements in public health have been brought about by advances in medical <highlight>science</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医学的进步给公众健康带来了巨大的改善。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 科学和技术；科学技术；科学与技术
国家科学博物馆；国家自然博物馆

sense_info_list.en: knowledge about the natural world that is based on facts learned through experiments and observation

examination_example.sentence: It is difficult for small schools to teach <highlight>science</highlight> because they don't have enough teachers or equipment (设备).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于小型学校来说，教科学很困难，因为它们没有足够的教师或设备。

examination_example.sentence: China has made great achievements in <highlight>science</highlight> and technology since 1978.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自1978年以来，中国在科学技术方面取得了巨大成就。

examination_example.sentence: It is mostly about the development of modern <highlight>science</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它主要是关于现代科学的发展。

sense_info_list.en: a subject that is formally studied

examination_example.sentence: Computer <highlight>science</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 计算机科学

examination_example.sentence: In 1963 he received a Bachelor of <highlight>Science</highlight> in electrical engineering.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1963年，他获得了电子工程理学学士学位。

examination_example.sentence: Ray Tomlinson created the first email system before he received a Bachelor of <highlight>Science</highlight> in electrical engineering.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雷·汤姆林森在获得电气工程理学学士学位之前，创建了第一个电子邮件系统。
